ItemDesc: Mechanical engine left behind from the Old World. Advanced material used for enhancement.
ItemBGDesc: It uses Geomarrow as the energy source. When powered, it spews wandering auroras, not sparkles.\n\n"Only the Technology Division directly under the Supreme Guardian has access to information regarding the Old World. I lost my privileges after I was fired."

ItemComefrom.Desc: Automatons at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe
